Assign the data members of the struct 'parameters' to the corresponding variables.

Parameters
parameters- struct of parameters
points_per_leaf- max number of points per leaf allowed
trees_no- size of forest
t- number of dimensions to build a tree
max_leaf_check- maximum number of leaves to check
rotate_option- flag for rotation
shuffle_enable- flag for shuffling
sample_size- for computing variances
